name: Ice Buster Free
description:
Ice-Breaking game "Ice Buster" is out now!

There is no other brick-breaking like this one!

Have you seen the price of the game with this much content to be so fruitful?

Abundant play contents at an affordable price! Over 100 fun-filled puzzle games, Ice Buster!

Aiming to be the best Ice-breaking game of the 2011, is finally launched in the AppStore!

★ Game Features ★

- A whopping nine special items and other similar puzzle games with endless abundance difference!
- Simple and stylish design to the visual fun!
- User-friendly interface game control (Full Screen Control)!
- Over 100 fun-filled puzzle maps!

If you can dare to beat 100 stages, get this right now ^ ^
